channel.title: academic on Vivek's blog
channel.description: Recent content in academic on Vivek's blog

item.title: On reading academic papers
item.description: Continuous learning is a critical skill. The internet houses a panoply of learning material for almost any topic under the sun. YouTube is my go-to for learning anything and everything - for it is easy to digest and entertaining. I’d regard YouTube to be on the lower side of information density. Contrastingly, reading acadmic papers is something I’ve begun recently. YouTube and academic papers are on the opposite extremes of information density - which is why I like reading papers.
